verses.roman:
bāhu tuli' hari bali' prema-dṛṣṭye cāya
kariyā kalmaṣa nāśa premete bhāsāya

synonyms: bāhu tuli'-raising the arms; hari bali'-chanting the holy name; prema-dṛṣṭye—with His glance of deep love; cāya—He looks; kariyā—causing; kalmaṣa—to sins; nāśa—destruction; premete—in love of God; bhāsāya—He floods.
translation: Raising His arms, chanting the holy name and looking upon all with deep love, He drives away all sins and floods everyone with love of Godhead.
